description: This file defines the `ExecutionService` class responsible for running pytest on specified scripts, managing execution logs and results, and interfacing with a `StorageService` for directory management.

classes.name: ExecutionService
classes.description: Class responsible for executing pytest on scripts and collecting results.

methods.name: None __init__(self, storage: StorageService | None = None)
methods.description: Initializes the ExecutionService with an optional StorageService object.

methods.name: Tuple[int,str,str] run_scripts(self, run_id: int, script_paths: List[str])
methods.description: Runs pytest on provided script paths, writes logs, and returns the process result and log file locations.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, storage: StorageService | None = None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: run_scripts
ctags.pattern: /^    def run_scripts(self, run_id: int, script_paths: List[str]) -> Tuple[int, str, str]:$/
